<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1/workspaces/{slug}/projects/{project_id}/cycles/{cycle_id}/cycle-issues/"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Assign multiple work items to a cycle. Automatically handles bulk creation and updates with activity tracking.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

>
  
</ParamsDetails>
